sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Cmdb workspace CI overview index</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[gs.log("Fix Script: Started executing the script for Cmdb workspace CI overview index"); var indexCreator = new AddIndexesForCMDBTables(); indexCreator.createIndex('cmdb_ci', 'life_cycle_stage, sys_class_path, sys_class_name', 'ci_overview_life_cycle'); indexCreator.createIndex('cmdb_ci', 'sys_class_path, sys_class_name', 'ci_overview_class_path'); gs.log("Fix Script: Finished executing the script for Cmdb workspace CI overview index");]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-28 01:45:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>653d367a77030110ee0d0cc2fa5a99d0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Cmdb workspace CI overview index</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_653d367a77030110ee0d0cc2fa5a99d0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 01:45:46</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
